mapper.select:
SELECT goods_lot_num, goods_consumption_date, warehousing_standard_quantity, warehousing_total_quantity, warehousing_remaining_quantity, pwb.warehouse_id AS warehouse_id, pwb.company_num, pwb.option_num, po.option_code, po.option_name
FROM purchs_warehousing_body pwb LEFT JOIN purchse_option po ON po.option_num = pwb.option_num WHERE pwb.company_num = 1 -- AND po.option_code = 'LH0011' AND warehousing_remaining_quantity != 0 ORDER by goods_consumption_date
